author: USA TODAY
title: Morgan Freeman slyly tugged on a player's shorts
text:

A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Morgan Freeman slyly tugged on a player's shorts Alysha Tsuji , USA TODAY 6:39 p.m. ET Feb. 3, 2017 
Morgan Freeman (right) attends the game between the Mississippi Rebels and the Mississippi State Bulldogs at The Pavilion at Ole Miss. Mississippi defeated Mississippi State 88-61. (Photo: Spruce Derden-USA TODAY Sports) 
Morgan Freeman went to the Ole Miss vs. Mississippi State game on Tuesday night to support the Rebels, as is evident in this clip. Hey, Morgan Freeman. You're not supposed to do that. But we'll give you a pass this time. #HailState pic.twitter.com/VwlAcKZAUu â€” MSU Men's Basketball (@HailStateMBK) February 2, 2017 
Freeman was caught lightly tugging on a Bulldogs' player's shorts, while everyone around him laughed. 
Both of the team Twitter accounts quickly decided that it was fine. Mississippi State said they'll give him a pass, and Ole Miss said no one can question the actor who played God in Bruce Almighty. . @HailStateMBK We definitely don't encourage that behavior @HailStateMBK ... but who are we to question the guy who plays God? pic.twitter.com/JBEXUfWUDz â€” Ole Miss Basketball (@OleMissMBB) February 2, 2017 
Ole Miss was excited to have him at the game. Look who's in the house tonight! Welcome to the Pavilion Morgan Freeman! pic.twitter.com/rFrpLtTj3e â€” Ole Miss Basketball (@OleMissMBB) February 1, 2017 ðŸ”¦ðŸ”¦ðŸ”¦Time for "I Saw the Light" ft. Morgan FreemanðŸ”¦ðŸ”¦ðŸ”¦ pic.twitter.com/ho3gSg6HOm â€” Ole Miss Basketball (@OleMissMBB) February 1, 2017 
Ole Miss beat Mississippi State, 88-61. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/morgan-freeman-ole-miss-mississippi-state-shorts/ Most Popular
